entry.title: Current Conditions: 9.4°C

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature falling to plus 4 this afternoon.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to plus 4 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning late this evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 3 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 26 January 2023
